name: Brello and the Drain Cloud
description:
Brello and the drain cloud is a puzzle adventure game with platforming components.

 After observing the great catastrophe that the minions of the evil King Steam Steel are causing with the planet's water, Brello decides to embark on an adventure through the world of Brarc to recover his friends the droplys. Pyra, a curious little adventurer, will help him overcome the adversities of his mission in exchange for Brello's protection from his greatest nemesis: the water.

This version is still a prototype of the final version of the game, there is still a lot of work ahead and we hope you leave a review so we can improve it!

NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN MAIN CHARACTER

In Brello and the Drain Cloud you control an umbrella!

Not innovative enough for you? You'll be able to glide by opening up, carry little characters on top of you through water and even protect them from the rain!

                                                           

UNIQUE ART DIRECTION

Each of our characters has been created with a lot of love and detail so that they have a unique personality and stand out within Brello.

A FLAMING AND INTELLIGENT COMPANION

Pyra, our adventure companion, does not need anyone to tell her what to do at any time in order to interact with the environment and move forward. On her own, thanks to her curious attitude, she will discover new paths and help the player to overcome obstacles that without her he would not be able to overcome.
